page.name: Resources for employment-related anti-discrimination in the Rehab Act
page.content:
Resources for employment-related anti-discrimination in the Rehab Act

There are legal considerations for individuals with disabilities during the job application process and once employed for obtaining reasonable accommodations and for accessing employment benefits and privileges. These legal considerations are beyond the scope of this presentation.

See the Resources section at the end of this course for a list of online resources for learning more about employment-related anti-discrimination provisions of the Rehab Act.

 

Continue on to Americans with Disabilities Act Amendments Act (ADAAA)
